description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Total tower defense mayhem!  Electron Defense is a 3D tower defense game featuring 30 challenging campaign missions with unique puzzle-like gameplay, plus an endless supply of random levels!  Think you can stop those dastardly particles from escaping the game grid?
description.short: Total tower defense mayhem!  Electron Defense is a 3D tower defense game featuring 30 challenging campaign missions with unique puzzle-like gameplay, plus an endless supply of random levels!  Think you can stop those dastardly particles from escaping the game grid?
